text: Below is the all time medal table for Summer Asian Games from 1951 to 2018. This does not include the medals won at the Asian Winter Games and other events hosted by the Olympic Council of Asia. == Medals (1982-2018) == ==Games== Number Events Gold Silver Bronze Total 1 - 1951 57 57 57 55 169 2 - 1954 77 77 77 75 229 3 - 1958 112 112 112 126 350 4 - 1962 120 120 122 130 372 5 - 1966 140 140 140 170 450 6 - 1970 135 137 133 153 423 7 - 1974 200 202 199 208 609 8 - 1978 199 201 199 226 626 9 - 1982 196 199 200 215 614 10 - 1986 269 270 268 310 848 11 - 1990 308 310 309 357 976 12 - 1994 338 339 337 403 1,079 13 - 1998 377 378 380 467 1,225 14 - 2002 419 427 421 502 1,350 15 - 2006 424 428 423 542 1,393 16 - 2010 476 477 479 621 1,577 17 - 2014 439 439 445 575 1,459 18 - 2018 465 464 465 622 1,551 Total Total 4,777 4,766 5,757 15,300 ==Related pages== * All-time Asian Winter Games medal table * All-time Asian Para Games medal table ==References== * Asian Summer Games Medal Count ==Other websites== * OCA: Asian Games Category:Asian Games
title: All-time Asian Games medal table
